Bio

Hello, I'm Prince, an interaction designer working to solve complex human-computer interactions through empathetic user research and delightful visual designs.

As a research-driven designer, I have the essential skills to own a product end-to-end, right from sketching to high fidelity visual design and final handoff to developers. I enjoy generating ideas or innovating on concepts to positively affect every touch points of peoples lives.My colleagues would describe me as a resourceful, motivated person who exudes positivity and proactiveness in every circumstance.

I'm currently seeking opportunities that would enable me to fully delve into user research that leads to satisfying visual designs and affect the daily lives of people.
